TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Daz? Why have you begun a recording? Who are you sending a message to?
DAZ: Ah, my love, this is not a message! I simply wish to record these next few moments.
DAZ: My love.. The many revolutions around the sun I have spent with you have been nothing short of magical.
DAZ: Your spirit brightens my darkest days, and your keen mind inspires me in everything we do.
DAZ: You make me feel so appreciated and loved at all times.. And I love you so, so much.
DAZ: Cassava, will you take my appendage in marriage?
CASSAVA: Daz.. I've waited so long to hear-!
DAZ: Yes! I knew you'd say yes! Hypothesis confirmed! You said yes!!
CASSAVA: D-Daz? I haven't given you my response yet! But yes, yes! Of course I would take your appendage in marriage!
DAZ: The <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> succeeded, Cassava! AND we're engaged! Yes!!
CASSAVA: What? Is that true?! Oh, what incredible news!
CASSAVA: We should join our friends at the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station!</color> Quickly, my love: let us travel to the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color> at once!
DAZ: But, my love, there is a projection wall right here! This news cannot wait: let us write to the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station's'</color> projection wall instead!
